body:
Dear Radiance users,

Does anyone have any advice on how to obtain/find alternatives for ra_tiff and falsecolor on windows?

I have been using the following install on win 7 64bit:
"MinGW Radiance 3R9 installer for Windows" from http://www.bozzograo.net/radiance/index.php?module=Downloads&func=view&cid=4&start=0

Many thanks for your time

David Birch
Software Performance Optimisation Group
Dept Computer Science
Imperial College London
http://www.doc.ic.ac.uk/~db805/
subject: [Radiance-general] ra_tiff & falsecolor on Windows
